document_data.name: Robe of Healing
document_data.mainbody: '''''Robe of healing''''' was a special [[enchantment]] and [[necromancy]] [[quest spell]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell enchanted the cloak or robe of the caster. The now-enchanted cloak or robe allowed the caster to walk among wounded creatures, healing as they touched the cloak or robe. Over a thousand creatures could be cured by means of this spell before it expired. A creature could be healed by this spell once per week.
document_data.Usage: The spell was available to [[cleric]]s of [[Karsus]].<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/104/Forgotten Deities: Karsus|4}}
